name: UNNotificationAttachment
desc: A media file associated with a notification.

items.name: UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsTypeHintKey
items.desc: A hint about an attachment’s file type.

items.name: UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailHiddenKey
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the attachment’s thumbnail is hidden.

items.name: UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailClippingRectKey
items.desc: The clipping rectangle for a thumbnail image.

items.name: UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailTimeKey
items.desc: The frame number of an animation to use as a thumbnail image.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the attachment.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL of the file for this attachment.

items.name: type
items.desc: The UTI type of the attachment.
